summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending page 133 of the Official Land Use Map, (Vol. 1 of Plats, page 57, of the Records of King County) to rezone property located at 2106 24th Avenue South, from Commercial-one with a 40' height limit (C1-40) to Commercial-one with a 65' height limit (C1-65) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Sclater Partners for Thistledown, LLC, C.F. 304901 Application. 2104484)
